query.name: findAllByStudySubject
query.sql: SELECT sgm.*, sg.name as group_name,sgc.name as class_name FROM SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP sgm,STUDY_GROUP sg,STUDY_GROUP_CLASS sgc, STUDY_SUBJECT ss, STUDY s WHERE sgm.study_subject_id=? AND sgm.study_group_id=sg.study_group_id AND sgm.study_subject_id=ss.study_subject_id AND s.study_id = ss.study_id AND (s.parent_study_id = sgc.study_id OR ss.study_id=sgc.study_id) AND sgm.study_group_class_id = sgc.study_group_class_id ORDER BY class_name asc

query.name: findByStudySubjectAndStudyGroupClass
query.sql: SELECT sgm.*, sg.name as group_name,sgc.name as class_name FROM SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP sgm,STUDY_GROUP sg,STUDY_GROUP_CLASS sgc, STUDY_SUBJECT ss, STUDY s WHERE sgm.study_subject_id=? AND sgc.study_group_class_id = ? AND sgm.study_group_id=sg.study_group_id AND sgm.study_subject_id=ss.study_subject_id AND s.study_id = ss.study_id AND (s.parent_study_id = sgc.study_id OR ss.study_id=sgc.study_id) AND sgm.study_group_class_id = sgc.study_group_class_id ORDER BY class_name asc

query.name: create
query.sql: INSERT INTO SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP (study_group_class_id, study_subject_id, study_group_id, status_id, owner_id, date_created, notes) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,sysdate,?)

query.name: update
query.sql: UPDATE SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP SET STUDY_GROUP_CLASS_ID=?, STUDY_SUBJECT_ID=?,STUDY_GROUP_ID=?, STATUS_ID=?,DATE_UPDATED=?, UPDATE_ID=?, NOTES=? WHERE SUBJECT_GROUP_MAP_ID=?

query.name: findAllByStudyGroupClassAndGroup
query.sql: SELECT sgm.*, ss.label FROM subject_group_map sgm, study_subject ss WHERE sgm.study_group_class_id=? AND sgm.study_group_id=? AND sgm.study_subject_id = ss.study_subject_id

query.name: getCurrentPK
query.sql: SELECT subject_group_map_id_seq.currval AS key from dual
